Namo:
Well... I Talked for a long time, but the job really easy. Now we need to destroy the Dragon Clan and the Undead in the southern part of the Valley of Dragons, and then install there.
You need to destroy monsters kind of Sacrificial Dragon, a Ferocious Dragon, Dragon Dust, Drake-vampire, Bloody Drake Commander, Warrior Bloody Graves, the Magician Bloody Graves, the Knight of the Bloody Graves and Deadly Tornado, just 100 enemies, and see what happens there.
